languages.text: "В сменную вахту я снова застал хормейстер за молитвой. Как и в те разы. Кажется, он вообще не спит, только молится".

traits.locale_text: "Во время ночного цикла я снова застал хормейстер во время молитвы. Как и в прошую смену. И в позапрошлую. Как только капелла пустеет, он встает на колени и начинает яростно молиться".

languages.text: "I saw the Choirmaster praying again on my shift. Like the previous times. I don't think he sleeps at all. All he does is pray."
languages.original_text: "В сменную вахту я снова застал хормейстер за молитвой. Как и в те разы. Кажется, он вообще не спит, только молится".

traits.locale_text: "I saw the Choirmaster praying again on my shift. Like the previous times. I don't think he sleeps at all. All he does is pray."
"I saw the Choirmaster praying again on my shift. Like the previous times. I don't think he sleeps at all. All he does is pray."

"I saw the Choirmaster praying again on my shift. Like the previous times. I don't think he sleeps at all. All he does is pray."

languages.text: «He visto al maestro del Coro rezar otra vez durante mi turno. Igual que las anteriores veces. Creo que nunca duerme, solo reza».
languages.original_text: "I saw the Choirmaster praying again on my shift. Like the previous times. I don't think he sleeps at all. All he does is pray."

traits.locale_text: «He visto al maestro del Coro rezar otra vez durante mi turno. Igual que las anteriores veces. Creo que nunca duerme, solo reza».

languages.text: 「シフト中に、クワイアーマスターが再び祈っているところを目撃しました。前もそうでしたよ。全く寝ていないのでしょう。あの人は祈ってばかりです」
languages.original_text: "I saw the Choirmaster praying again on my shift. Like the previous times. I don't think he sleeps at all. All he does is pray."

traits.locale_text: 「シフト中に、クワイアーマスターが再び祈っているところを目撃しました。前もそうでしたよ。全く寝ていないのでしょう。あの人は祈ってばかりです」

languages.text: “我值班的时候，又看到唱诗大师在祈祷了。他一直都是这个样子，我感觉他根本就不用睡觉，他时时刻刻都在祈祷。”
languages.original_text: "I saw the Choirmaster praying again on my shift. Like the previous times. I don't think he sleeps at all. All he does is pray."

traits.locale_text: “我值班的时候，又看到唱诗大师在祈祷了。他一直都是这个样子，我感觉他根本就不用睡觉，他时时刻刻都在祈祷。”

languages.text: "Ich habe während meiner Schicht schon wieder den Chormeister beten sehen. Wie die vorherigen Male. Ich glaube, er schläft nie. Er betet immerzu nur."
languages.original_text: "I saw the Choirmaster praying again on my shift. Like the previous times. I don't think he sleeps at all. All he does is pray."

traits.locale_text: "Ich habe während meiner Schicht schon wieder den Chormeister beten sehen. Wie die vorherigen Male. Ich glaube, er schläft nie. Er betet immerzu nur."

languages.text: « J'ai vu le maître de chœur prier pendant mon service. Comme d'habitude. C'est à se demander s'il dort... On dirait qu'il passe son temps à prier. »
languages.original_text: "I saw the Choirmaster praying again on my shift. Like the previous times. I don't think he sleeps at all. All he does is pray."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai vu le maître de chœur prier pendant mon service. Comme d'habitude. C'est à se demander s'il dort... On dirait qu'il passe son temps à prier. »

languages.text: "Vardiyamdayken Koro Şefi'nin yine dua ettiğini gördüm. Önceki seferler gibiydi. Hiç uyuduğunu sanmıyorum. Tek yaptığı dua etmek."
languages.original_text: "I saw the Choirmaster praying again on my shift. Like the previous times. I don't think he sleeps at all. All he does is pray."
